definition: battered and exhausted/stuck in a dilemma

sentences.english: Why did he always think of HIM when he was in discomfiture?

sentences.english: He made an embarrassing gaffe at the convention last weekend.
sentences.chinese: 他在上周末的会议上出了洋相，狼狈不堪。

sentences.english: Bob was in a pickle when his car broke down in a pouring rainstorm.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃的汽车在倾盆大雨中熄火，使他狼狈不堪。

sentences.english: The battle for your authenticity can be an ugly one.
sentences.chinese: 为你的真实而战可能狼狈不堪。

sentences.english: Huang Zhankui back to spike ridge, flustered, they are not.
sentences.chinese: 黄占魁回到狼牙岭，狼狈不堪，众人也是唉声叹气。

sentences.english: For sole sake of rejection, I even run away and battered.
sentences.chinese: 为了拒绝，甚至让自己逃跑，颠沛流离，狼狈不堪。
